REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1654 reute d f BC-FEDERATED-FIN'L-SAVIN 03-19 0053

TEXT.TITLE: FEDERATED FIN'L SAVINGS <FEDF> INITIAL PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Federated Financial Savings said it declared an initial quarterly dividend of 85 cts a share April 27, record April 13. This is the first dividend paid by Federated since its conversion to a stock company from a mutual on Jan 28, 1987. Reuter
